```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library('tidyverse')
options(scipen = 999)
telcom = read_csv('https://s3.amazonaws.com/foco-ds-portal-files/WA_Fn-UseC_-Telco-Customer-Churn.csv')
```


```{r}
dat = telcom
dat
```

```{r}
summary(dat)
```
```{r}
dat = dat %>% 
  filter(!is.na(TotalCharges))
```



```{r}
dat %>%
  select(Churn) %>%
  unique()

```

```{r}
dat %>%
  group_by(Churn) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(n_pct = n / sum(n))
```

```{r}
dat %>%
  ggplot(aes(y=MonthlyCharges, x=Churn)) + 
  geom_bar(stat='identity')
```


```{r}
dat %>%
  mutate(monthly_total_diff = MonthlyCharges - TotalCharges) %>%
  filter(monthly_total_diff == 0)
```
